name: l5r-roller
title: Legend of the 5 Rings Roller
description: Supports rolling dice for: Legend of the 5 Rings 5th edition, Genesys, Vampire the Masquerade 5th edition, FFG's Star Wars TTRPG. Check out the README.md on the homepage for a guide on how to roll various dice.
author: Bernhard Posselt
